title: Chinese Dragons Puzzle
description: Chinese Dragons Puzzle game is free online game and you have 6 images in three modes to play. Choose one of the mode for the game that you previous choose mode easy, medium or hard and start to play. Drag and drop the pieces to solve the puzzle and create an image. Enjoy, and have fun!
instructions: Use mouse to play this game.

title: Car Charging Station
description: Car Charging Station is puzzle jigsaw game with images of charging cars. choose image and start to play this game. Click on play and when pieces is shuffled drag it in right place to get the image with charging car.
instructions: Use mouse to drag the pieces.

title: Funny Turkey Jigsaw
description: Funny Turkey Jigsaw game is free online game and you have 6 images in three modes to play. Choose one of the mode for the game that you previous choose mode easy, medium or hard and start to play. Drag and drop the pieces to solve the puzzle and create an image. Enjoy, and have fun!
instructions: Use mouse to play this game.

title: Sporos
description: Spread the spores to cover the entire board to complete each puzzle. Try to complete all 50 levels in this fun online brain teasing game.
instructions: Click or tap to place the spores

title: Colorful Clock
description: The clock is moving very fast and in a very weird way! All you have to do is to match the color of the clock’s hand with the circle around it by clicking on the screen on the right time. It may seems easy, but the clock will move faster and faster as you progress and it changes color and direction after every successful match. You will lose if you don’t click on the right time or you match the wrong colors. So focus and try to earn as much score as you can!
instructions: Use your mouse to play the game or tap on the screen!

title: Kill Virus
description: Connect the virus to kill them in this html5 game. Press any virus to start. Now move the 'mouse or finger tip' on identical adjacent virus (horizontally, vertically or diagonally). Select at least 3 virus. Release mouse button to make them match. Each 6th virus will give a bonus. More than 7 virus will give you a time bonus. Kill the request virus within the giving time, or you will lose the game. What's the max level can you play?
instructions: Use mouse to play this html5 mobile kill virus games.

title: Running Horse Slide
description: Play this slide puzzle games of the running horses. It's include 3 images and 3 modes to play.
instructions: Use mouse to play this html5 running horse games.

title: Circus Girl Jigsaw
description: Have you ever wondered what it would be like to be in the circus? Well, now you can live it through completing these circus jigsaws of skilled, acrobatic girls. You can choose 3 types of levels, each one harder than the last. Are you up for it? Have fun!
instructions: Click the mouse or tap the screen!

title: Classic Slide Puzzle
description: Another Classic sliding game with numbers. You task is to arrange the numbers in order of magnitude. Sliding the numbers and try to do this fastest as you can. Heave Fun!
instructions: Use your mouse to play the game or tap on the screen!

title: Aliens In Space Hidden
description: Aliens In Space Hidden is a free online game from genre of memory and monsters truck games. Flip the tiles and try to match them up in pairs. Pair up all the tiles to win. Try to complete the game in as few moves as possible! There are is 4 levels. Use mouse to click or tap to screen on the squares. Concentrate yourself and start to play. Enjoy!
instructions: Use your mouse to play or tap on the screen!

title: Halloween Defence
description: You are attacked by Halloween pumpkins and you need to click or touch them to destroy the pumpkins. They will come from all sides and you need to be careful and to react fast.
instructions: Tap on screen to play this game.

title: Dogs Jigsaw
description: Dogs Jigsaw game is free online game and you have 6 images in three modes to play. Choose one of the mode for the game that you previous choose mode easy, medium or hard and start to play. Drag and drop the pieces to solve the puzzle and create an image. Enjoy, and have fun!
instructions: Use mouse to play this game.
